p: There were no statistically significant differences in leukocyte, neutrophil, lymphocyte, platelet, CRP, ferritin, LDH, ALT, AST, sO 2 and total bilirubin values just before and after 1 week of CP. The hemoglobin level in our patients treated with CP was statistically significantly lower than before CP. The reason for this was thought to be dilutional anemia due to hydration applied to patients.
